name: Bass Invaders
description:
Bass Invaders is a rhythmic fusion of classic shoot 'em up and live audio analysis.

Battle to the other side of the galaxy on a mission to save the Earth in a campaign mode with a genre-spanning soundtrack, or load literally any song and experience your favourite music in a new way.




Play using any song you like, loading from your own files or using online video. Any track, any time. No limits.


High scores and ranked leaderboards for every song. Fill your ship energy levels to unleash power mode. Nail that perfect run and show your skill.


Five difficulty levels so you can just enjoy the music or really challenge your skills.


Launch into a galaxy spanning campaign mode as Ace and PZO-116 battle to save the world from alien invaders. Enjoy every level with its own custom song from a genre-spanning soundtrack.


Two-player local co-op in every game mode (requires at least one controller). Battle through the campaign with your best friend. Play winner-stays-on with your mates and your favourite music.



  • Custom colours
  • Colourblind modes
  • Simplified backgrounds
  • Enemy outlines
  • Gameplay assists
  • Button hints
  • Key rebinding
